text: Maga jevha tyancyajavala amacyatarphe satya ye'una pohacale, tevha mhanu lagale, ka nahi dili geli yala tasi vastu jasi musala dili geli hoti. Tara kaya musala yapurvi je kahi dile gele hote tyaca lokanni inkara navhata kela? (Ughadapane) mhanale hote ki he doghe jadugara aheta. Je ekamekance sahayyaka aheta ani amhi tara tya sarvanca inkara karanare ahota
